DDL.statement: CREATE VIEW `VIEW_PALLET_EXPIRY` AS select `p`.`SSCC` AS `SSCC`,`p`.`LOCATION_ID` AS `LOCATION_ID`, `p`.`MATERIAL` AS `MATERIAL`,`p`.`BATCH_NUMBER` AS `BATCH_NUMBER`,`p`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `p`.`QUANTITY` AS `QUANTITY`,`p`.`UOM` AS `UOM`,`p`.`DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE` AS `DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE`, `p`.`STATUS` AS `STATUS`,`p`.`EAN` AS `EAN`,`p`.`VARIANT` AS `VARIANT`,`p`.`DESPATCH_NO` AS `DESPATCH_NO`, `p`.`CONFIRMED` AS `CONFIRMED`,`p`.`LAYERS` AS `LAYERS`,`p`.`SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE` AS `SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE`,`p`. `CUSTOMER_ID` AS `CUSTOMER_ID`,`p`.`MHN_NUMBER` AS `MHN_NUMBER`,`p`.`DECISION` AS `DECISION`, `b`.`EXPIRY_DATE` AS `EXPIRY_DATE`,`m`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION`,`m`.`OLD_MATERIAL` as `OLD_MATERIAL`,`c`.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS `CUSTOMER_NAME`, `c`.`PRINT_ON_LABEL` AS `PRINT_ON_LABEL` from (((`APP_PALLET` `p` join `APP_MATERIAL_BATCH` `b`) join `APP_MATERIAL` `m`) join `APP_CUSTOMER` `c`) where ((`b`.`MATERIAL` = `p`.`MATERIAL`) and (`b`.`BATCH_NUMBER` = `p`.`BATCH_NUMBER`) and (`m`.`MATERIAL` = `p`.`MATERIAL`) and (`c`.`CUSTOMER_ID` = `p`.`CUSTOMER_ID`));
